verses.name: Psalms 115:7
verses.text: They have hands, but they handle not: feet have they, but they walk not: neither speak they through their throat.

verses.name: Psalms 115:8
verses.text: They that make them are like unto them; so is every one that trusteth in them.

verses.name: Psalms 115:9
verses.text: O Israel, trust thou in the Lord: he is their help and their shield.

verses.name: Psalms 115:10
verses.text: O house of Aaron, trust in the Lord: he is their help and their shield.

verses.name: Psalms 115:11
verses.text: Ye that fear the Lord, trust in the Lord: he is their help and their shield.
